item.title: Missing Dreams.
item.description: I don’t think I have dreams. There aren’t any specific goals I’ve always wanted to reach for, and I wonder if that resonates with others. Having dreams, especially distinct ones, is often portrayed in America. But perhaps as a byproduct of my aimlessness, I seem to lack any. I want goals to aim for. I think a lack of direction is a result of vague and undefined endpoints. Having daily flexibility and stable income is not a dream â€” it’s more survival and not wanting to waste away precariously at a suboptimal job.
